postText: My arm is broken and I can't mow my lawn. The HOA is trying to repossess my house and destroy my daffodils. Could you save me before Tuesday?
I need someone to pick up the dog poop off of my lawn. It's terrible. Oh GAWD
Looking for someone to help me clean out my gutters
Looking for some hunks to take out all my junk in my garage
Looking for someone to help take care of my lawn while I'm out of town for a couple weeks
Looking for someone to teach me how to code
